articles.title: Family of Chinese Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Leaves
articles.content:
Family of Chinese Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Leaves
						
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Family of Chen Lei, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and its party flew back on Wednesday after participating in the memorial service on the occasion of the first anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
